title: possiable sever lag?
body:
I am just wondering if anyone else on the OCE server is getting server lag of anywhere up to 500 ms??? keeps happening over the last 2 to 3 days now{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
if this is server lag riot plz fix

replies.body: 500ms consistent is a full disconnection, not lag. Check out the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and follow the steps. Let me know if anything helps.
